text:
Two Months Before Her Due Date, Khloé Kardashian Mourns the Death of Her Dog Gabbana

It’s one of the saddest moments in anyone’s life, and being a celebrity doesn’t make the loss any easier to take.

On Tuesday, Khloé Kardashian, 33, took to Instagram to say goodbye to her loyal dog Gabbana.

Get push notifications with news, features and more.

“Last night my sweet Gabbana passed away,” wrote Kardashian. “She was more than a pet. She was my first child, my companion and my friend. She was incredible! She made sure I was never lonely even during lonely times. The house will never be the same. I never thought I would be this devastated over loosing [sic] a dog but 14 years, is a long time together. She filled a significant role in my life and I’m forever grateful. I love you Goober!! I’ll remember you always!”

In a follow-up post on her app on Wednesday, Kardashian recalled more fond memories of the pup. “When I was a kid, I wanted to be a vet when I grew up, and had this insane plan to drive around in an RV and pick up stray animals, LOL,” she wrote. “So when my mom and Bruce separated, I was immediately like, ‘Let me take Gabbana!’ She was the family dog, and since Kendall and Kylie both moved out, I thought Gabbana was lonely. I wanted her to have a fun home again!!!”

Khloé’s sister, Kendall Jenner, 22, also posted a goodbye to Gabbana via Instagram on Tuesday, expressing her love and condolences.

“I’ll miss your kisses forever Gooby,” wrote Kendall. “I know you’re up there swimming, little fishy.”

The girls’ beloved pet has been part of the family for a long time and was known for her love of swimming and Pup-Peroni, Kardashian said. “She is so well-trained and super smart. Sometimes Gabbana can be a little overly friendly, LOL. When people come to the house, she’ll just go right up to them and start licking.”
title: Two Months Before Her Due Date, Khloé Kardashian Mourns the Death of Her Dog Gabbana

meta_data.description: The Labrador retriever was 14 years old
